page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT (HANDICAPPED)
page.content:
The unit was opened in April 1972 to create employment for physically and mentally handicapped people.They are trained in the use of sewing machines and in simple engineering.They receive a wage of Â£79 per week with the opportunity of making a bonus of 15% with travelling expenses of Â£20.The are sold all over the world and there is an annual turnover of Â£200,000.The unit sudsidised by the government. There are 67 centres in the country and four in Devon.They hope a second building can be obtained so that the mentally and physically handicapped can be separated.
By Paul,Gary,Heidi and Louise.
